text: seasons vector 4-digit years associated given women's college basketball seasons. (Min: 2004) ... Additional arguments passed underlying function writes season data database (used update_wbb_db()). dbConnection DBIConnection object, returned DBI::dbConnect() tablename name play play data table within database

title: Load wehoop women's college basketball play-by-play — load_wbb_pbp
text: dataframe 55 columns: shooting_play Logical value (TRUE/FALSE) indicating whether play shooting play sequence_number Sequence number supposed represent shot-possession, examine last two numbers see multiple events occur within shot-possession. shot-possession basically sequence plays shot, change possession, probably things like technical fouls like. soon shot goes , new sequence starts title: Update or create a wehoop play-by-play database — update_wbb_db
text: dbdir Directory database shall located dbname File name existing desired SQLite database within dbdir tblname name play play data table within database force_rebuild Hybrid parameter (logical numeric) rebuild parts complete play play data table within database (please see details information) db_connection DBIConnection object, returned DBI::dbConnect() (please see details information)

title: Update or create a wehoop play-by-play database — update_wbb_db
text: Logical TRUE/FALSE

title: Update or create a wehoop play-by-play database — update_wbb_db
text: function creates updates data table name tblname within SQLite database (drivers via db_connection) located dbdir named dbname. data table combines play play data every available game back 2002 season adds recent completed games soon available wehoop. argument force_rebuild hybrid type. can rebuild play play data table either whole wehoop era (force_rebuild = TRUE) just specified seasons (e.g. force_rebuild = c(2019, 2020)). Please note following behavior: force_rebuild = TRUE: data table name tblname removed completely rebuilt scratch. helpful new columns added -Season. force_rebuild = c(2019, 2020): data table name tblname preserved rows 2019 2020 seasons deleted re-added. intended used ongoing seasons ESPN's data provider can make changes underlying data week. parameter db_connection intended advanced users want use DBI drivers, MariaDB, Postgres odbc. Please note arguments dbdir dbname dropped case db_connection provided argument tblname still used write data table database.

Please note following behavior: force_rebuild = TRUE: data table name tblname removed completely rebuilt scratch. helpful new columns added -Season. force_rebuild = c(2019, 2020): data table name tblname preserved rows 2019 2020 seasons deleted re-added. intended used ongoing seasons ESPN's data provider can make changes underlying data week. parameter db_connection intended advanced users want use DBI drivers, MariaDB, Postgres odbc.
